Title: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8 for Windows 10 Version 1809 and Windows Server 2019 for x64 (KB4486153)
Description: The Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8 is a highly compatible, in-place update for all the previous versions of .NET Framework 4.X. After you install this update, you may have to restart your computer.
UninstallNotes: This software update can be removed by selecting View installed updates in the Programs and Features Control Panel.
